meanings.definition: Giving or resulting in pleasure; enjoyable.
meanings.sent1: The warm sun on my face was a pleasurable feeling.
meanings.sent2: Listening to music is a pleasurable experience for many people.
meanings.sent3: Eating ice cream on a cold day might seem pleasurable to some.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children filled the room with a pleasurable melody.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers brought a pleasurable sense of calm.

meanings.sent1: The soft, fluffy blanket was a pleasurable addition to the couch.
meanings.sent2: A walk in the park can be a pleasurable way to spend the afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring was a pleasurable sound to wake up to.
meanings.sent4: The colorful painting created a pleasurable visual experience.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the homemade pie was truly pleasurable.
